answers.text: S3 bucket policies specify what actions are allowed (or denied) for which principals.
S3 Bucket Policies specify CORS settings.
S3 Bucket Policies apply to IAM users, groups, or roles.
S3 Bucket Policies apply only to S3 buckets.
S3 Bucket Policies define what a principal is able to do in an AWS environment.
S3 Bucket Policies have mostly replaced S3 ACLs.

text: Which of the following are correct statements about IAM policies and S3 bucket policies?
